name: Holiday Cookies 🍪
description:
Grandma makes the best holiday cookies. Can you find her hidden recipe and bake some before the rest of your family arrives?

🍪 🍪 🍪

Use the arrow keys to move, bump into people (and things!) to talk to them. If you've looked everywhere but can't find the recipe, go talk to Grandma.

Made in Bitsy, using exit and end from dialogue and directional avatar. Music made in BeepBox.
